X-Hive/DB 7.0.0

Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Interfaces
com.xhive.util.interfaces.XhiveSqlLoaderIf
          Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf or XhiveCSVFileLoaderIf instead 
 

Deprecated Classes
com.xhive.query.interfaces.XhiveXQueryParam
          The usage of this class is deprecated in favor of XhiveXQueryQueryIf.setVariable(String, boolean) et al. Use XhiveNodeIf.createXQuery(String) to obtain a XhiveXQueryQueryIf. 
 

Deprecated Fields
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveLibraryIf.PARSER_IGNORE_PUBLIC_ID
          use PARSER_IGNORE_CATALOG instead. 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveLibraryIf.PARSER_NORMALIZE
          In practice, this option has no effect since all text is put into one text-node by default. 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveNodeIf.executeXQuery(String, XhiveXQueryParam[])
          The usage of XhiveXQueryParam is deprecated in favor of XhiveXQueryQueryIf.setVariable(String, boolean) et al. Use XhiveNodeIf.createXQuery(String) to obtain a XhiveXQueryQueryIf. 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveNodeIf.executeXQuery(String, XhiveXQueryParam[], XhiveDocumentIf)
          The usage of XhiveXQueryParam is deprecated in favor of XhiveXQueryQueryIf.setVariable(String, boolean) et al. Use XhiveNodeIf.createXQuery(String) to obtain a XhiveXQueryQueryIf. 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveCatalogIf.getASModelByPublicId(String)
          use getASModelById(String id, boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs) instead 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveCatalogIf.getASModelByPublicId(String, boolean)
          use getASModelById(String id, boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs) instead 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveCatalogIf.getASModels()
          use getASModels(boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs) instead 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveDocumentIf.getConfig()
          Use XhiveDocumentIf.getDomConfig(). 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveDocumentIf.getEncoding()
          Use XhiveDocumentIf.getXmlEncoding(). 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveCatalogIf.getPublicIds()
          use getIds(String schemaType, boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs) instead 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveCatalogIf.getPublicIds(boolean)
          use getIds(String schemaType, boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs) instead 
com.xhive.core.interfaces.XhiveDriverIf.getSqlLoader()
          Use getSqlDataLoader() instead 
com.xhive.util.interfaces.XhiveSqlLoaderIf.loadSqlData(DOMImplementation, String, char, char, char, boolean, String)
          Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf 
com.xhive.util.interfaces.XhiveSqlLoaderIf.loadSqlData(DOMImplementation, String, char, char, char, boolean, String, int)
          Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf 
com.xhive.util.interfaces.XhiveSqlLoaderIf.loadSqlData(DOMImplementation, String, char, char, char, boolean, String, int, String)
          Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf 
com.xhive.util.interfaces.XhiveSqlLoaderIf.loadSqlData(DOMImplementation, String, char, char, char, boolean, String, int, String, String[], boolean[])
          Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf 
com.xhive.util.interfaces.XhiveSqlLoaderIf.loadSqlData(DOMImplementation, String, char, char, char, boolean, String, int, String, String[], boolean[], boolean[])
          Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf 
com.xhive.util.interfaces.XhiveSqlLoaderIf.loadSqlData(DOMImplementation, String, String, String, String, String)
          Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf 
com.xhive.util.interfaces.XhiveSqlLoaderIf.loadSqlData(DOMImplementation, String, String, String, String, String, String, int)
          Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf 
com.xhive.util.interfaces.XhiveSqlLoaderIf.loadSqlData(DOMImplementation, String, String, String, String, String, String, int, String)
          Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf 
com.xhive.util.interfaces.XhiveSqlLoaderIf.loadSqlData(DOMImplementation, String, String, String, String, String, String, int, String, String[], boolean[])
          Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf 
com.xhive.util.interfaces.XhiveSqlLoaderIf.loadSqlData(DOMImplementation, String, String, String, String, String, String, int, String, String[], boolean[], boolean[])
          Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveCatalogIf.publicIdExists(String)
          use idExists(String id, boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs) instead 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveCatalogIf.publicIdExists(String, boolean)
          use idExists(String id, boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs) instead 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveDocumentIf.setEncoding(String)
          Use XhiveDocumentIf.setXmlEncoding(java.lang.String). 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveDocumentIf.setErrorHandler(DOMErrorHandler)
          use DOMConfiguration::getDomConfig().setParameter("error-handler", ....); to set the errorhandler 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces.XhiveDocumentIf.validateDocument()
          Use Document.normalizeDocument() which allows revalidation against a linked DTD or XML Schema by setting the DOMConfiguration parameters.
